channel.title: Need help please
channel.description: i need help with my server when i log in and go 2 quest it says a website but cant remember how 2 change and i need 2 make my client so that ppl can download it any help?? oh i will need u 2 help me on teamviewer ok if u can help then PM me

item.title: Need help please
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“run moneygod, post:2, topic:388613”]i went in 2 rsframe.java and this is all it says

import java.awt.*;

final class RSFrame extends Frame {

public RSFrame(RSApplet RSApplet_, int i, int j) {
	rsApplet = RSApplet_;
	setTitle("Trace's Client by Galkon");
	setResizable(false);
	setVisible(true);
	toFront();
	setSize(i + 8, j + 28);
	setResizable(true);
	setLocationRelativeTo(null);
}

public Graphics getGraphics() {
	Graphics g = super.getGraphics();
	g.translate(4, 24);
	return g;
}

public void update(Graphics g) {
	rsApplet.update(g);
}

public void paint(Graphics g) {
	rsApplet.paint(g);
}

private final RSApplet rsApplet;

}[/quote]
Sorry I’m tired, I meant RSInterface.java.

Where did you find my name to PM me? Anyway, do as I said about the quest part.

As for people downloading your client, first make sure you change the IP in the client to your No-IP you’re going to use to host your server, save and compile that, and then providing you have WinRAR, you need to right click on the client folder and select Add To Archive.

Compress the folder and then upload to any popular file hosting site (mediafire and uppit are good ones).

Edit: Here’s the file I said I’d attach.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help please
item.dc:creator: @run_moneygod run moneygod
item.description:
@run_moneygod wrote:

i went in 2 rsframe.java and this is all it says

import java.awt.*;

final class RSFrame extends Frame {

public RSFrame(RSApplet RSApplet_, int i, int j) {
	rsApplet = RSApplet_;
	setTitle("Trace's Client by Galkon");
	setResizable(false);
	setVisible(true);
	toFront();
	setSize(i + 8, j + 28);
	setResizable(true);
	setLocationRelativeTo(null);
}

public Graphics getGraphics() {
	Graphics g = super.getGraphics();
	g.translate(4, 24);
	return g;
}

public void update(Graphics g) {
	rsApplet.update(g);
}

public void paint(Graphics g) {
	rsApplet.paint(g);
}

private final RSApplet rsApplet;

}
